Choose Healer's Lore or Battle Cleric's Lore. Check the chat for detailed descriptions.
Combat Superiority or Alternate
Choose Combat Superiority or Combat Agility. Check the chat for detailed descriptions.

Class Feature '%s' added to '%s' special ability list. You must select the Beast Mastery Fighting Style and Beast Mastery Prime Shot alternative class feature for this character to be legal and correct.

Choose Scoundrel Weapon Talent or Sharpshooter Talent. Check the chat for detailed descriptions.

Resistive or Shielding Healing Infusion

Cleric Domains
Choose a Cleric domain. These determine your channel divinity and class feature powers.
